It is essential that the injection system is protected from dirt. The smallest dirt particle will damage the pump pistons and pump cylinders, where clearance is just 0.001 to 0.002 mm.
A single strand of hair is about 20 times thicker than this tolerance. Several different filters are used in the injection equipment.
When replacing the fuel filter it is important to take care of the environmental issue as well, the used fuel and filter must be disposed in an proper way.
